Areas for Improvement: 
Cleaniness_NEG: Focus on keeping the area clean and reducing clutter.
Amenities_NEG: Ensure that all necessary amenities are available for customers. 
Location_NEG: Ensure that the location is safe and easy to access.
Services_NEG: Improve customer service by providing prompt and polite service.

Value_NEG: Monitor prices to ensure value for customers.
